summary: An external email dated July 14, 2023, from an unidentified sender to an FBI recipient, reporting that a woman named '_' has received threatening texts from a potentially identifiable individual. The sender states they will forward screenshots of the texts in a follow-up email.

events.title: Email reporting threats
events.description: An external email is sent to an FBI contact reporting that a woman named '_' has received threatening text messages from a potentially identifiable individual.

keyFacts: An email dated July 14, 2023, was sent to an FBI contact regarding threatening text messages.
The threats were directed at a woman referred to as '_', who took screenshots of the texts.
The sender of the threats may have been 'stupid enough' to reveal their identity in the texts.
The email sender indicates they will forward the screenshot evidence in a subsequent email.
